attributes.action: Increase the speed limit on wide well lit roads to 40mph
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The 30mph speed limit on wide open and well lit roads is ludicrouse.  Many of the roads in my area are wide, well lit, well maintained roads that are miles from civilisation.  Yet the speed limit remains 30mph and to make the matter worse speed bumps forcing 20mph have recently been installed.
